text: a motorcade of discontent thousands of
demonstrators headed for the president's
official residence outside the capital
Ukraine national flags were mounted on
bonnets and roofs in a fresh show of
force this is a peaceful action a rally
to the residents to tell him about the
voice of the citizens I'm going to say
to him Happy New Year and I will wish
him good health and call on him and the
government to resign but in fact there
was a coffin was carried to symbolize
what protesters hope marks the end of
the political life of Viktor Yanukovych
the anti-government protest movement was
reenergized by a brutal attack on
journalists tatyana chernobyl on
christmas day
she'd accused mr. Yanukovych of
corruption over his financing of the
residents an allegation the president
denies demonstrators first took to the
streets in late November when mr.
Yanukovych abandoned an association
agreement with the European Union in
favor of closer ties with Russia
[Music]
in the heart of Kiev Independence Square
is still packed with protesters whose
demands for the government's resignation
are showing no signs of waning Melanie
Ruiz BBC News
